title: Resident Evil 7: Biohazard – Gold Edition – v1.03u5 + 12 DLCs
body:
Resident Evil 7: Biohazard – Gold Edition – v1.03u5 + 12 DLCs


Genres/Tags: Action, First-person, 3D, Horror
Company: Capcom
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI13
Original Size: 34.7 GB
Repack Size: from 19.2 GB [Selective Download]

 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: Upera (Uploaded by Nice_2000, NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Resident.Evil.7.Biohazard.Gold.Edition-PLAZA ISO release: plaza-resident.evil.7.biohazard.gold.edition.iso (37,092,163,584 bytes)
  • Optional Russian voiceovers localization by Team Raccoon & R.G. MVO added (v1.1, 192 MB)
  • Game version: v1.03u5, 12 released DLCs included and activated
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation (when installed with all original voiceovers, unused videos and videos in original quality)
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you can skip downloading and installing of voicepacks, unused videos and you can also select what videos you want to see in-game: in original quality or lossy recoded ones (smaller size)
  • Note: the Russian VO installation also requires English voiceovers to be installed
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 34.7 to 19.2~23.3 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes: ~12 minutes on 8-threads CPU; ~25 minutes on 4-threads CPU
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 38 GB (up to 45 GB during installation)
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911

Game Description

Resident Evil 7 biohazard is the next major entry in the renowned Resident Evil series and sets a new course for the franchise as it leverages its roots and opens the door to a truly terrifying horror experience. A dramatic new shift for the series to first person view in a photorealistic style powered by Capcom’s new RE Engine, Resident Evil 7 delivers an unprecedented level of immersion that brings the thrilling horror up close and personal.

Set in modern day rural America and taking place after the dramatic events of Resident Evil® 6, players experience the terror directly from the first person perspective. Resident Evil 7 embodies the series’ signature gameplay elements of exploration and tense atmosphere that first coined “survival horror” some twenty years ago; meanwhile, a complete refresh of gameplay systems simultaneously propels the survival horror experience to the next level.

Included DLCs

  • Banned Footage Vol.1
  • Banned Footage Vol.2
  • Survival Pack A
  • Survival Pack B
  • Survival Pack C
  • A Coin & Hard Mode
  • B Coin & Hard Mode
  • C Coin & Hard Mode
  • D Coin & Hard Mode
  • E Coin & Hard Mode
  • End Of Zoe
  • Not A Hero

You can skip downloading of voicepacks you don’t need, unused videos and videos in quality you don’t want. Here is the list of selective/optional files. You MUST download at least one of speech and videos pack.

  • fg-selective-videos-original.bin (in-game videos in original quality, ~20 MBps)
  • fg-selective-videos-lossy.bin (recoded, lossy in-game videos, ~3-5 MBps)
  • fg-selective-english.bin
  • fg-selective-french.bin
  • fg-selective-german.bin
  • fg-selective-italian.bin
  • fg-selective-japanese.bin
  • fg-selective-spanish.bin
  • fg-optional-unused-videos.bin (some videos, no longer need by the game)
  • fg-optional-russian.bin (optional Russian voiceovers; installing it will make the game non-MD5-perfect)

In example, if you want to launch the game with Spanish voiceovers and need in-game videos in original quality – skip all “selective” and “optional” files, but download fg-selective-spanish.bin, fg-selective-videos-original.bin & all main (01-03) files.

Backwards Compatibility

This repack is NOT backwards compatible with my previous RE7 repacks.
